metadata.title: CVE-2024-36288 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: SUNRPC:Fix loop termination condition in gss_free_in_token_pages() Thein_token->pages[] array is not NULL terminated. This results in thefollowing KASAN splat: KASAN: maybe wild-memory-access in range[0x04a2013400000008-0x04a201340000000f]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-36288` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-44-generic - 6.8.0-44.44
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-44-generic - 6.8.0-44.44
